data_table.description: Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA3A
variable.description: Q3a. Critical results noted from the echocardiogram: tamponade [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA3B
variable.description: Q3b. Critical results noted from the echocardiogram: aortic dissection [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA3C
variable.description: Q3c. Critical results noted from the echocardiogram: thrombosed or frankly dysfunctional prosthetic valve [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA3D
variable.description: Q3d. Critical results noted from the echocardiogram: pseudo aneurysm [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA3E
variable.description: Q3e. Critical results noted from the echocardiogram: intracardiac abscess or obvious vegetation [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA3F
variable.description: Q3f. Critical results noted from the echocardiogram: intracardiac thrombus [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA3G
variable.description: Q3g. Critical results noted from the echocardiogram: other [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA1Y
variable.description: Q1. Year of date of echocardiogram [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA2Y
variable.description: Q2. Year of date of receipt of echocardiogram [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]

variable.name: ECA4Y
variable.description: Q4. Year of date of reading [Echocardiography Alerts Notification Form]
